Rules.title: DISRUPTION
Rules.context: Enemy models attacking while within two spaces of this model lose one Boost Die on their attack rolls.

Rules.title: MECHANICAL
Rules.context: This monster is mechanical.

Rules.title: SAFEGUARD
Rules.context: If you are securing one or more buildings when you Power Up, you gain additional Power Die.

Rules.title: ENERGY CYCLE
Rules.context: If you roll two or more Action Dice on an attack made by this model and the attack hits an enemy model, after the attack is resolved you can move one Action Die from your Unit Pool to your Monster Pool.

Rules.title: BEAT BACK
Rules.context: If this model hits an enemy monster with this attack, after the attack is resolved you can move the monster hit up to two spaces in a straight line in any direction. During this movement, the target monster moves through and collides with buildings, unit, and hazards in its path. The target monster stops moving if it collides with another monster.

Rules.title: ANTI-AIR
Rules.context: This model gains +1 Boost Die when participating in brawl or blast attacks targeting a model with Flight.

Rules.title: FLIGHT
Rules.context: This model can end its movement on impassable terrain and is immune to hazards except when colliding with them.

Rules.title: WING LEADER
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units with the Flight special rule gain +1 Boost Die when participating in blast attacks.

Rules.title: RAPID FIRE
Rules.context: This model can make a blast attack in addition to any other attack it makes during each of it's Activations.

Rules.title: POWER GORGE
Rules.context: When this attack destroys an enemy model, you gain one additional Power Die.

Rules.title: ACTION: SPRINT
Rules.context: Durning your Monster Activaction, this model can spend one Action Die to perform a Sprint action. Advance this model up to three spaces, even if it has already advanced this turn.

Rules.title: MULTI-FIRE
Rules.context: After this model resolves a blast attack, it can immediately make a blast attack with the dice in play against another enemy model. This model can make two additional attacks in this way. This model cannot make ablast attack against the same model more than once in the same activation.

Rules.title: ACTION: FISSION
Rules.context: During your Monster Activation, this model can spend one Action Die to perform a Fission action. Push two Action Dice from your Unit Pool to your Monster Pool.

Rules.title: HIT & RUN
Rules.context: If this model hits a target model with this attack, immediately after the attack is resolved advance this model up to 3 spaces even if this model has already advanced this turn.

Rules.title: WEAPON MASTER
Rules.context: This attack does Super Damage.

Rules.title: FEEDING FRENZY
Rules.context: When this monster attacks a monster that is adjacent to any allied Faction unit, this model's attack does Super Damage.

Rules.title: STAMPEDE
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain +1 SPD.

Rules.title: MUNCH
Rules.context: If this monster destroys a unit with this attack, after the attack is resolved restore one point of health to this monster.

Rules.title: BLOOD RAGE
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain +1 Boost Die when participating in Brawl attacks.

Rules.title: LIGHTING ATTACK
Rules.context: This model can make a brawl attack in addition to any other attacks it makes during each of its activations.

Rules.title: EXPLOSION
Rules.context: If this attack hits a unit, all units adjacent to the target unit with a DEF equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled also suffer 1 damage point as a result of this attack. When determining the DEF of adjacent models, add any bonuses to DEF against blast attacks, including cover.

Rules.title: DEMOLISHER
Rules.context: When this model makes an attack, gain +1 Power Die for every building destroyed as a result of it's attack.

Rules.title: ARMORED
Rules.context: This monster is immune to damage from collisions with buildings.

Rules.title: RESILIENCE
Rules.context: This monster is immune to Super Damage.

Rules.title: RILED
Rules.context: When this model is damaged or destoryed by an enemy attack, you gain one Power Die.

Rules.title: UNEARTHLY RAGE
Rules.context: When this model is in play, other allied models gain Riled.

Rules.title: ACTION: TOW
Rules.context: Durning your Monster Activation, this model can spend one Action Die to perform a Tow action. Choose one allied unit within five spaces of this model and place it adjacent to this model. The placed model cannot advance after being placed.

Rules.title: SIDE STEP
Rules.context: If this model is missed by an attack, after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to three spaces.

Rules.title: ENERGY SAP
Rules.context: When this model hits an enemy monster with this attack, you can push one Action Die from your opponent's Monster Pool to their Unit Pool.

Rules.title: PENETRATOR
Rules.context: When resolving this attack, the target model suffers -1 DEF, to a minimum of 1.

Rules.title: AIR DROP
Rules.context: When this model performs a throw power attack, the target monster can be placed up to two spaces further away than the number of power dice rolled.

Rules.title: ACTION: TELEPORT
Rules.context: Durning your Monster Activation, this model can spend one Action Die to perform a Teleport action. Either choose an adjacent allied unit and place it adjacent to another allied model with Teleport or choose one allied unit adjacent to another allied model with Teleport and place it adjacent to this model.

Rules.title: COMBAT COORDINATION
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' brawl attacks gain the Hit & Run special rule.

Rules.title: REPOSITION
Rules.context: If this model is hit by an attack, after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to one space in any direction.

Rules.title: FLANK
Rules.context: Enemies withing two spaces of this model have their DEF reduced by 1 against brawl attacks made by allied models, to a minimum of 1.

Rules.title: FOCUSED WILL
Rules.context: Once per turn, if this model is hit by an attack, you can push 1 Action Die from your Unit Pool to your Monster Pool.

Rules.title: TACTICAL COMMAND
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' blast attacks gain the Hit & Run special rule.

Rules.title: POWER DRAIN
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy monster, the monster's controller loses one Power Dice.

Rules.title: DEATH BLOSSOM
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' blast attacks gain Penetrator.

Rules.title: SIPHON
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy monster, you gain one Power Die. That monster's controller loses one Power Die.

Rules.title: GRAPPLER
Rules.context: Enemy models cannot move through this model or models adjacent to it. Enemy models are not immune to hazards adjacent to this model.

Rules.title: TANTRUM
Rules.context: When this model is hit by a body slam or throw power attack, after the attack is resolved you can move this monster up to two spaces, then return all non-Faction units adjacent to this monster to their unit reserves.

Rules.title: DEMOLITION
Rules.context: If this attack his a building, all units adjacent to the target building with a DEF equal to of less than the number of strikes rolled suffer 1 damage point as a result of this attack.

Rules.title: DEFENSE ARRAY
Rules.context: Allied Faction units gain Force Field while within 3 spaces of this model. (A model with Force Field gains +1 DEF against blast attacks.)

Rules.title: GUERILLLA TACTICS
Rules.context: Allied Faction units gain Indirect Fire while within 3 spaces of this model.

Rules.title: INDIRECT FIRE
Rules.context: This attack ignores Cover.

Rules.title: HIGHT IMPACT
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain +1 Boost Die when participating in blast attacks.

Rules.title: STEADY
Rules.context: Enemy monsters do not roll Boost Dice when making body slam power attacks against this model.

Rules.title: WRECKING CREW
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain Demolisher.

Rules.title: FLING
Rules.context: When this attack hits a unit, choose a building or enemy model within five spaces of the unit hit. Roll the dice in play. If the chosen model's DEF is equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled, it takes 1 damage point.

Rules.title: TREACHEROUS TERRITORY
Rules.context: Enemy units treat spaces within two spaces of this model as rough terrain while advancing.

Rules.title: REACH
Rules.context: This model can make a brawl attack targeting any model within two spaces. This model can participate in combined brawl attacks against models within two spaces.

Rules.title: WATERLOGGED
Rules.context: This model is immune to hazards while advancing. When this model advances onto a debris tile that is a hazard, flip it to the rubble side.

Rules.title: SLINGSHOT
Rules.context: When this model performs a swat power attack or used the Fling trigger, the second target can be up to seven spaces away instead of five.

Rules.title: WINDUP
Rules.context: This monster's swat and throw power attacks do Super Damage

Rules.title: BULWARK
Rules.context: Enemy models cannot count spaced this model occupies when checking the range for an attack or trigger.

Rules.title: CRUNCH
Rules.context: When you roll a super strike on an Action Die on one of this monster's attack rolls, that attack does super damage.

Rules.title: KING TIDE
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain +1 DEF while in a water space and +1 SPD.

Rules.title: CHAIN REACTION
Rules.context: If this attack hits a unit, all unit adjacent to the target unit with DEF equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled also suffer 1 damage point as a result of this attack.

Rules.title: PRECISION STRIKE
Rules.context: You can reroll one Action Die on this attack.

Rules.title: MOTIVATOR
Rules.context: Other allied models that begin their advance within two spaces of this model gain +1 SPD.

Rules.title: ACTION: TACTICAL SHIFT
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Tactical Shift action. Advance any allied unit up to two spaces, even if it has already advanced this turn.

Rules.title: LEAD FROM THE FRONT
Rules.context: While within three spaces of this model, the blast and brawl attacks of allied units gain Precision Strike.

Rules.title: COMBO STRIKE
Rules.context: If this attack hits, after the attack is resolved this model can immediately make a power attack.

Rules.title: ACTION: IGNITE
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die while on or adjacent to a debris tile to perform an Ignite action. If the tile is rubble, flip it to the hazard side. Models occupying the same space as the hazard suffer the effects of the hazard as if theyhad collided with it.

Rules.title: FEED THE FLAMES
Rules.context: This model's attacks gain Penetrator if the target is on or adjacent to a hazard tile.

Rules.title: FIRE PROOF
Rules.context: This model is immune to hazards.

Rules.title: RETURN FIRE
Rules.context: When this model is missed by a blast attack, it can immediately make a blast attack with the dice in play.

Rules.title: FIRE STEP
Rules.context: When this model moves onto a rubble tile, flip it to the hazrd side. All models occupying the same space as the hazard suffer the effects of the hazard as if they had collided with it.

Rules.title: ACTION: SACRIFICE
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Sacrifice action. Destroy one adjacent allied unit to restore one point of health to this monster.

Rules.title: ACTION: SUMMON
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Summon action. Take one Faction unit from your unit reserves and place it in play adjacent to this model.

Rules.title: ACTION: TELEKINESIS
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Telekinesis action. Choose one unit within two spaces of this model. Move the chosen unit one space.

Rules.title: TERRIFY
Rules.context: While adjacent to this model, enemy units cannot roll Boost Dice in their attacks.

Rules.title: VAMPIRISM
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy monster, restore 1 Health to this monster after this attack has been resolved.

Rules.title: ARCANE VOID
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied units' blast and brawl attacks gain Siphon.

Rules.title: GRAVID
Rules.context: If this monster is hit by an attack, after the attack is resolved, you can choose one Faction model from your unit reserves and place it in play in an unoccupied space adjacent to this model.

Rules.title: UNWIELDY
Rules.context: Enemy monsters do not roll Boost Dice when making throw power attacks against this model.

Rules.title: MANUFACTURE
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy unit, immediately after the attack has been resolved replace the enemy unit hit with a Faction unit from your unit reserves. The replacing Faction unit cannot participate in an attack this activation.

Rules.title: ENERGY DRAIN
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy monster, your opponent must move one Action Die from their Monster Pool to their Unit Pool

Rules.title: ACTION: ABDUCT[4]
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform an Abduct action during its Activation. If this model is adjacent to an enemy unit with DEF 4 or less, return the enemy unit to your opponent's unit reserves.

Rules.title: ACTION: TRANSPORT
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Transport action. Take one allied unit with the Cargo special rule from your unit reserves and place it play adjacent to this model.

Rules.title: SPOTTER
Rules.context: Enemy models within two spaces of this model have their DEF reduced by 1 against blast atatcks made by allied models, to a minimum of 1.

Rules.title: TECHICAL COMMAND
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' blast attacks gain the Hit & Run special rule.

Rules.title: ACTION: REPAIR
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die while adjacent to a debris pile to perform a Repair action. If the tile is a hazard, flip it to the rubble side. if the tile is rubble and unoccupied, remove it and return a destroyed building to play on that foundation.

Rules.title: NANO CONSTRUCTION
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units without flight gain Action: Repair.

Rules.title: RAMPAGER
Rules.context: When this monster performs a rampage power attack, you gain +1 Power Die for every model destroyed.

Rules.title: DISINTEGRATE
Rules.context: Buildings destoryed by this attack are not replaced by rubble or hazards.

Rules.title: ACTION: INNER FIRE
Rules.context: During this model's activation, it can spend one Action Die to perform an Inner Fire action. You gain five Power Dice.

Rules.title: ACTION: OVERDRIVE
Rules.context: During this model's activation, this model can spend one Action Die to perform an Overdrive Action. Advance this model up to its SPD, even if it has already advanced this turn.

Rules.title: REDLINE
Rules.context: After an Action this model performs is resolved, it suffers 1 damage point.

Rules.title: ANNIHILATE
Rules.context: This monster's attacks do super damage.

Rules.title: HIGH IMPACT
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain +1 Boost Die when participating in blast attacks.

Rules.title: DEVASATION
Rules.context: If this attack his a building, all units adjacent to the target building with a DEF equal to of less than the number of strikes rolled suffer 1 damage point as a result of this attack. When determining the DEF of adjacent models, add any bonuses to DEF against blast attacks, including cover.

Rules.title: KINETIC DISTORTIONS
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units gain High Mobility.

Rules.title: ULRIMATE WEAPON
Rules.context: This model can make both a blast and a brawl attack in addition to any other attack it makes during each of your Monser Activations.

Rules.title: CLOAK
Rules.context: This model cannot be targeted by blast attacks made by a model more than two spaces away.

Rules.title: TUNNELER
Rules.context: Other allied models that begin an advance within two spaces of this model gain High Mobility during that advance.

Rules.title: ACTION: BLITZ
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Blitz action. Advance an allied unit adjacent to this model up to its SPD, even if it has already advanced this turn.

Rules.title: ACTION: EXTINGUISHER
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die while adjacent to a debris tile to perform an Extinguisher action. If the tile is a hazard, flip it to the rubble side.

Rules.title: EARTHWORKS
Rules.context: Allied Faction units gain +1 DEF against brawl attacks while within three spaces of this model.

Rules.title: DOUBLE DUTY
Rules.context: This model can perform two different Actions during an activation.

Rules.title: CUT POWER
Rules.context: If this attack hits an enemy monster, that monster's controller loses one Power Die for each super strike in the attack roll.

Rules.title: FOLLOW THROUGH
Rules.context: If this attack hits, after the attack is resolved this model can immediately make a blast or brawl attack, whichever is different from this attack. An attack generated by Follow Through cannot generate another attack.

Rules.title: DESTABILIZER
Rules.context: This model gains +1 Boost Die when participating in brawl or blast attacks that target a building.

Rules.title: SEISMIC STEP
Rules.context: Once during each of your Monster Activations, if this model makes a stomp power attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can move up to one space and make another stomp power attack with the dice in play.

Rules.title: STRIP MINING
Rules.context: While this model is in play, allied Faction units' brawl attacks gain the Destabilizer special rule.

Rules.title: ACTION: FLAK FIELD[2]
Rules.context: This model can spend one Action Die to perform a Flak Field action. Return all units adjacent to this model with DEF 2 or less to their unit reserves.

Rules.title: POWER SINK
Rules.context: During each activation, the first time your opponentrolls Power Dice for an attack, you gain one Power Die.

Rules.title: ENTROPIC PRESENCE
Rules.context: While this model is in play, enemy monsters cannot restore health.

Rules.title: JAM
Rules.context: Enemy models and buildings your opponent has secured cannot use Actions while within two spaces of this model.

Rules.title: MASTERMIND
Rules.context: While this model is in play, if two or more allied Faction models participate in a combined attack, the attack gets +1 Boost Die.

Rules.title: ROCKET ASSIST
Rules.context: If the second target of this model's swat power attack is hit, all units adjacent to that target with DEF equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled also suffer 1 damage point as a result of this attack.

Rules.title: JUGGERNAUT
Rules.context: If a space this monster would move into while rampaging is occupied by a monster, this monster stops moving and any of the occupying monsters with a Def equal to or less than the number of strikes rolled for the rampage suffer 1 damage. If this monster is in its hyper form they suffer Super Damage.

Rules.title: RAMPANT DESTRUCTION
Rules.context: This model can advance up to three spaces before performing a rampage power attack.

Rules.title: BIFURCATE
Rules.context: This monster begins the game with only one model in play. When this monster goes hyper, place the second model in play within two spaces of the first model. Any remaining damage is applied to the first model's Health Track. Both models share all stats and rules on this card but are treated as separate monsters, and their damage is tracked separately.

Rules.title: IMPROVISED WEAPON
Rules.context: If this model is on or adjacent to a debris tile, it gains +1 Boost Die when participating in an attack.

Rules.title: INEXORABLE
Rules.context: This monster's alpha form Health cannot be restored.

Rules.title: HUNKER
Rules.context: This unit does not suffer damage from brawl and blast attack triggers.

Rules.title: UNCRUSHABLE
Rules.context: This model is immune to stomp power attacks.

Rules.title: Commander: Exo-Armor
Rules.context: Allied same-named grunt units within two spaces of this unit gain +1 Boost Die when participating in brawl or blast attacks.
